home.latest_apis_title: Latest REST APIs added to repository
home.description_sentence_1: RestAPImantics is a project which aims at listing public and documented REST APIs and expose them in a uniformed and user-friendly way.
home.description_sentence_2: The end goal of this site is also to help standard search engines to reference REST APIs by providing them semantical metadata on Rest APIs.
home.description_sentence_3: To do that, our awesome automated tool extract from the API documentation information and convert it in a convenient form for search engines to understand what the API is about (schema.org ontologies).
